about_the_game:
You wake up nowhere, with no body.

In fact, less than that,

You feel all the different parts of yourself have been torn away and thrown to the wind.

You stand and look ahead,

Not even knowing how you're standing without a form.

Before you is a beautiful haven, but you're no fool, you know a gilded cage when you see one.

Time to pull yourself together.

What, or who, is the Star Haven?

In a serene journey traversing a floating archipelago in search of secrets, you seek to regain that which has been unjustly taken. The Star Haven is a conscious place that has drawn you inside of itself as it tries to understand the nature of corporeality. But in order to do so, it has dismembered your very essence – your hands, feet, eyes, mind and heart – and strewn them across the land, to watch with serene detachment as you struggle to re-member yourself.

Dream of the Star Haven is a 1st person giant-leap platformer, a unique hybrid of exploration, puzzling and combat - a magical odyssey through the being known as Star Haven where you soar gracefully and eventually even bend gravity itself to your will, giving you the power to literally turn the dreamlike world upside-down in search of the missing parts of yourself.

As you venture deeper into its secrets you'll discover strange energies - some that grant powers, and some curses that take them away.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of discovery, graceful platforming, and a dreamlike atmosphere. Uncover all that's hidden among the oasis of tranquil and expansive vistas that is Star Haven's strangely freeing prison of illusion - this being's living dream.

Cruise through the low-stakes core of the game, challenge yourself with the more difficult collectathon of its secret puzzle, or delve into the hardcore permadeath mode.

Embrace the joy and melancholy of a harmonious yet subtly twisted journey as you reach toward a higher Dream of the Star Haven
detailed_description:
You wake up nowhere, with no body.

In fact, less than that,

You feel all the different parts of yourself have been torn away and thrown to the wind.

You stand and look ahead,

Not even knowing how you're standing without a form.

Before you is a beautiful haven, but you're no fool, you know a gilded cage when you see one.

Time to pull yourself together.

What, or who, is the Star Haven?

In a serene journey traversing a floating archipelago in search of secrets, you seek to regain that which has been unjustly taken. The Star Haven is a conscious place that has drawn you inside of itself as it tries to understand the nature of corporeality. But in order to do so, it has dismembered your very essence – your hands, feet, eyes, mind and heart – and strewn them across the land, to watch with serene detachment as you struggle to re-member yourself.

Dream of the Star Haven is a 1st person giant-leap platformer, a unique hybrid of exploration, puzzling and combat - a magical odyssey through the being known as Star Haven where you soar gracefully and eventually even bend gravity itself to your will, giving you the power to literally turn the dreamlike world upside-down in search of the missing parts of yourself.

As you venture deeper into its secrets you'll discover strange energies - some that grant powers, and some curses that take them away.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of discovery, graceful platforming, and a dreamlike atmosphere. Uncover all that's hidden among the oasis of tranquil and expansive vistas that is Star Haven's strangely freeing prison of illusion - this being's living dream.

Cruise through the low-stakes core of the game, challenge yourself with the more difficult collectathon of its secret puzzle, or delve into the hardcore permadeath mode.

Embrace the joy and melancholy of a harmonious yet subtly twisted journey as you reach toward a higher Dream of the Star Haven
